Modification_Detail.description: extracted metadata from PDS3 catalog and modified to comply with PDS4 Information Model

Volume_PDS3.archive_status_note: The database contains a value of NULL. For the purposes of this exercise, the value was replaced with IN_QUEUE
Volume_PDS3.description:
Cassini Orbiter Magnetometer Calibrated MAG data in 1 second and 1 minute averages available covering the period 1999-08-16 (DOY 228) to 2009-09-30 (DOY 273). The data are provided in RTN coordinates 1 minute averages throughout the mission, with Jupiter centered, and Saturn centered coordinates (both 1 second and 1 minute averages) for both Jupiter flyby and Saturn Tour (beginning 2004-05-14 = DOY 135) respectively.
Note that these data are in the process of being updated to PRODUCT_VERSION_ID 3, which has been processed using an improved calibration. The PRODUCT_VERSION_ID of any given data file is indicated in the LBL file associated with it. For more information on the differences between versions of these, please data refer to the file CO_MAG_CAL_FULL_DS.CAT located in the CATALOG directory of this volume. To order old versions of these data files, please contact the PDS/PPI node at pds-operator@igpp.ucla.edu.
These data have not undergone formal PDS peer review. As always please exercise caution when using these data.
